law.catch_line: Attorney General to have staff available specially trained in child sexual abuse -- Assistance to prosecutors.
law.text: The Attorney General shall have staff available who are specially trained in child sexual abuse. Commonwealth's attorneys and county attorneys may request assistance in the investigation and prosecution of child sexual abuse cases in accordance with provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 351, sec. 10, effective July 14, 1992.
